Instruction: 'Trim the Brussels sprouts and halve them.'
In a small bowl, whisk together peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, minced garlic, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes.'
In a large bowl, toss the halved Brussels sprouts with the peanut butter sauce until evenly coated.'
'Spread the Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.'
'Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes
